title: How wondrous were the marks divine
author: Isaac Watts

verses.text:
How wondrous were the marks divine
That in thy meekness used to shine,
That lit thy path, O Son of God!
The lonely path thy feet have trod.

O Jesus, who like thee so meek, so mild,
So patient, pure, and undefiled?
O Jesus, who like thee did ever go
So sinless through a world of woe?

Oh, who like thee so humbly bore
The scorn, the scoffs of men, before?
So meek, so lowly, yet so high,
So glorious in humility?
